data.expected_result: Discord starts scrolling from your current position
data.short_description: Tapping on any section in the emoji picker scrolls you from the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the emoji picker via the "Add Reaction" option - Tap on any section to scroll to that section - After Discord finished scrolling, tap on another section - Observe the starting position of the scroll the second time you tap a section
